_comment: Created by NCODowd on 27/07/2016 12:15:10 using v2.7
title: How have perceptions of toilet cleanliness changed among inpatients?
analysis_commentary:
In 2015, 95% of respondents found the toilets and bathrooms they used in hospital were clean. 64% of respondents said the toilets were very clean in 2015, a sizable increase from 48% in 2006. Still, 1% of respondents found the toilets and bathrooms were not at all clean, which is a decrease from 3% in 2006.
Updated August 2016.
